title: #334: Ghislaine Maxwell, Trump's Honeypot and The Erasing Of History With Ryan Dawson
description:
Thank you very for tuning for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we were going to have Ryan Dawson on for the entire episode but some miscommunication happened and he wasn't able to show up until about 30 minutes into the show. So I rant about BLM and the current state of cancel culture. Luckily Ryan Dawson does join us and we discuss the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell, is Trump part of Epstein's Pedo network and why we should be erasing history even the bad parts! Thank you so much for your support.
